name: Zombies Against Us
description:
Be aware ! Zombies are HERE !

Defend your city against those brainless creatures, everyone is counting on you.

Zombies Against Us is a tower defense, in order to defend your city, you must place and manage various turrets. The Zombies have a defined path that they will follow, and you can place defenses along it.

That's what we have done so far :

  • 6 Turrets (With Upgraded Version).
  • 4 Enemies (+ 2 Armored Variants & 1 Boss).
  • 1 map.

This game is still in development and almost everything  is subject to change.

This page is here to show you what has been done so far, letting you play the latest version of our game, to collect feedbacks and discuss about the game.

Why Early Access ?
  • We love to share everything we have done right away.
  • Your feedbacks are very valuable. Sometimes we don't have the best ideas or we miss the little thing that makes it perfect.
  • The interactions and discussions about our games are always pleasing and very rewarding.

Actually, you can play the feedback demo for free. There is not enough content to make a game out of it and we need more feedbacks.

What is the feedback demo ?

The feedback demo is a really early version of the game, which you can play for free. The objective of such demo is to gather feedbacks and test the gameplay of the game.

What do I gain ?

If you provide us a significant or very useful feedback after playing the feedback demo, we will add you to a special list. When the game will be advanced enough to have a real version (not a feedback demo), all people from that list will receive a coupon offering them a discount of 75%.

You can send feedbacks via the "send feedbacks" button on the demo.

Your support is very important to us and we thank you for that. You can help us by :

  • Sharing the game and our social medias.
  • Giving us precious feedbacks.
  • Buying the game when it's done.
  • Twitter
  • Youtube
